description: These two make such a cute bdsm couple dont they? Dragonlilly is way too adorable and almost innocent looking in her summer dress and high heels. The Sarge isn't swayed by her cuteness however. He takes her down and keeps her there. Trademark tight crotchropes, tight bondage and thorough domming highlight this hot sexy shoot. Thanks Sarge for being such a good bad guy. And thanks Dragonlilly for suffering so beautifully for us.
title: Dragonlilly & The Sarge
